CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 27 reads: "Lifsher Nine Visits Courier Fair - The Fifsher [sic] A. C. Hill Top Pony League baseball team paid a visit to the third annual Courier Home Service Fair, last week, at the Hunt Armory, and posed for the above picture in front of the exhibit of the booth of the M. Fifsher [sic] Construction Company and Mark Lumber Company, its co-sponsors.  An interracial team, it is managed by Ted Akrie and John Allen.  Lemmie Gordon, manager of the Mark Lumber Company, is seen standing, at left, in the rear.  To his right stands Syd Lifsher who joined him in celebrating the appearance of the hustling group of youngsters before the cameraman."
TitMainTitle: Lifsher A. C. Hill Top pony league baseball team, including managers Ted Akrie and John Allen, and sponsors Lemmie Gordon and Syd Lifsher, posed in Hunt Armory for 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Little League Baseball, inc.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
